hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cat /etc/os*
export GOPATH=`pwd` cd $GOPATH
#Install Terraform sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y git wget make zip golang-1.9 export PATH=/usr/lib/go-1.9/bin:$PATH go version
export PATH=$GOPATH/bin:$PATH mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/hashicorp cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/hashicorp git clone https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform.git cd terraform/ git checkout v0.11.3
# While building Terraform, test also runs & Some of the tests are intermittent failures make 2>&1 | tee -a build_logs cat build_logs | grep "FAIL" | grep github.com | awk '{print $2}' >> test.txt while IFS='' read -r line || [[ -n "$line" ]]; do go test -v -timeout 20m $line until $? do go test -v -timeout 20m $line || true done done < test.txt
go get github.com/mitchellh/gox
#Install gox cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/mitchellh/gox git checkout v0.4.0 wget https://github.com/mitchellh/gox/pull/85.patch git config --global user.email "bagalvitthal94@gmail.com" git config --global user.name "vitthal bagal" git am 85.patch cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/mitchellh/ go get github.com/mitchellh/iochan go install ./...
#Build terraform
cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/hashicorp/terraform/ XC_OS=linux XC_ARCH=s390x make bin
file pkg/linux_s390x/terraform | grep "IBM S/390"
#Verification terraform --version | grep 0.11.3 echo "1 + 5" | terraform console
